LanguageData.AMAA_AllowAdeptusAstartesDesc: Allows forces of the Adeptus Astartes to spawn in new games
LanguageData.AMAA_AstarteEasyModeToolTip: Vastly reduced the difficulty of creating Astartes
LanguageData.AMAA_AstarteMaleOnlyToolTip: Allow creation of Female Astartes if disabled
LanguageData.AMAA_AstarteAgeMattersToolTip: If enabled, pawns older than {0} or younger than {1} are less likely to survive the transformation process
LanguageData.AMA_ShowSpecialRulesDesc: Shows Options related to general special rules.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowDeepStrikeDesc: "DeepStrike" enables units with this special rule to deploy directly into the heat of battle.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowInfiltrateDesc: "Infiltrate" enables units with this special rule to deploy in hidden positions ahead of the main force.
LanguageData.AMA_ShowWeaponSpecialRulesDesc: Shows Options related to weapon special rules
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRapidFireDesc: Weapons with the "Rapid Fire" special rule shoot twice as many rounds per burst and cooldown is reduced by half when a target is with half of its max range.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowGetsHotDesc: Weapons with the "Gets Hot" special rule have a chance to overheat when fired, this can have varios results, from light burn damage to the weapon exploding.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowJamsDesc: Weapons with the "Jams" special rule have a chance to jam each time its fired, interupting its burst and forcing it into an extended cooldown, this jam can damage the weapon.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowMultiShotDesc: Weapons with the "Multi Shot" special rule function like shotguns, firing a cluster of projectiles each time its fired.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowUserEffectsDesc: Weapons with the "User Effect" special rule have a negative effect that have a chance to affect the user each time a weapon is fired/used.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowForceWeaponEffectDesc: Weapons with the "Force Weapon" special rule when wielded by a psyker(Psychically Sensitive) can instantly kill or down their target with a single hit.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRendingMeleeEffectDesc: Weapons with the Melee "Rending" special rules attacks have a chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRendingRangedEffectDesc: Weapons with the Ranged "Rending" special rules projectiles have a chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AMA_AllowImperialWeaponsDesc: Allows Imperial Weaponry to spawn (Required for Imperial Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowMechanicusWeaponsDesc: Allows Mechanicus Weaponry to spawn (Required for Mechanicus Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowChaosWeaponsDesc: Allows Chaos Weaponry to spawn (Required for Chaos Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowEldarWeaponsDesc: Allows Eldar Weaponry to spawn (Required for Eldar Weaponry Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowDarkEldarWeaponsDesc: Allows Dark Eldar Weaponry to spawn (Required for Dark Eldar Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowTauWeaponsDesc: Allows Tau Weaponry to spawn (Required for Tau Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowOrkWeaponsDesc: Allows Ork Weaponry to spawn (Required for Ork Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowNecronWeaponsDesc: Allows Necron Weaponry to spawn (Required for Necron Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_AllowTyranidWeaponsDesc: Allows Tyranid Weaponry to spawn (Required for Tyranid Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AMA_RapidFireDesc: Full Firing Cycle time reduced from {5} to {6} when firing at targets within {4} cells.\nWarmup reduced by {0}% ({1} seconds) and Cooldown by {2}% ({3} seconds).
LanguageData.AMA_GetsHotDesc: This {0} is {1} and has a {2} chance to overheat per shot fired.
LanguageData.AMA_GetsHotCrit: it has a {0} chance to critically overheat, causing more damage to user and weapon.
LanguageData.AMA_GetsHotCritExplosion: Critical overheats have a {0} chance of cuasing the weapon to explode.
LanguageData.AMA_JamsDesc: This {0} is {1} and has a {2} chance to jam per shot fired.
LanguageData.AMA_MeltaDesc: Damage Vs Buildings and AP doubled when firing at targets within {0} cells.
LanguageData.AMA_VolkiteDesc: AP begins to drop off when firing at targets over {0} cells.
LanguageData.AMA_GaussDesc: has a {0} chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AMA_TeslaDesc: Bolt can arc to up to 3 nearby targets.
LanguageData.AMA_ConversionBeamDesc: Damage and AP increase the further the target is away.
LanguageData.AMA_Rending_ShotDesc: has a {0} chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AMA_Force_Strike: {0} has been {1} by a Force strike!
LanguageData.AMA_Phased_Out: the shot passes harmlessly through the {1}
LanguageData.AMA_DeepStrike_Incomming_Letter: A group of {0} are joining the battle via Deep Strike using {1}!
LanguageData.AMA_Infiltrators_Revealed_Letter: A group of {0} infiltrating were revealed!
LanguageData.AM_PlaceWorker_OnTopOfWalls: Can only be placed on Walls or Smoothed Stone
LanguageData.OG_VatGrowerStartCraftingGizmoDescriptio: Selects a organ to grow and then start filling the vat with the needed ingredients.
LanguageData.OG_VatGrowerStopCraftingGizmoDescription: Stops the growing process. Refunds inserted ingredients if the process was not started.
LanguageData.OG_CustomNameCompGizmoDescription: Sets a custom name which can be easily indentifiable.
LanguageData.OG_VatGrowerGenomesHint: No available genomes. Get them by making 'Genome Sequencers' in machining tables, then use them.
LanguageData.OG_AlertMaintenceRequiredExplanation: These growers require maintence or they will lose what they are growing and materials will be wasted!\n\nSend a doctor or researcher to maintain at once.
LanguageData.OG_LetterHumanlikeGrownDescription: Welcome vatgrown clone {0} to the colony!\n\nYou can either train them up from scratch with the help of their natural affinities or apply a Brain scan template on them to give them a skillset right away.
LanguageData.OG_BrainScanningRejectInput: {0} was rejected due to no valid bed could be found.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ModInfo: This faction is added by {ModName} and not currently present in your game.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.HiddenFactionInfo: This is a hidden faction and won't show up in your faction list.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RequiredFactionInfo: It is marked as required by {ModName}.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.NonSpawningFactionInfo: This faction is marked as non-spawning and you should probably just ignore it.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionButtonIgnore: Don't ask for this faction again
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionMessageFailedFu: Failed to create a faction with settlements.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionMinDistance: The minimum distance from player bases (recommended are {0}): {1}
LanguageData.AMArmouryUpdate: Total overhaul and rewrite of weapon special rules (no longer requires custom verbs). Large internal restructure, renaming to match conventions, this may cause issues with some items in save files. Retextures of most weapons to try to bring them more inline with RimWorlds Style. Retexture Servo-Skull. Added New weapons (Grot Blasta, Dakka Deffgun, Beamy Deffgun, Rokkit Launcha, Kombi-Burna, Kombi-Rokkit, Burna, Scorcha, Entrenching tool, Vanahime, Lucius Pattern Lasgun, Exitus Pistol, Exitus Rifle, Heavy Gauss Cannon, Tesla Carbine, Twin-Linked Tesla Carbine, Twin-Linked Gauss Blaster, Particle Projector, Synaptic Disintergrator, Kroot Pistol, Kroot Hunter Rifle, Reaper Chaingun, Traitor Missile Launcher, Volkite Serpenta, Volkite Charger, Volkite Caliver, Conversion Beamer, Flechette Blaster, Hand Flamer) Added Imperial Tempest Scion Carapace Armour Added Mod Options: for most features in the mod, including race and weapon special rules, weapon spawning. Added Deep Strike functionality: Allows units with this ability to stay in reserve and deploy directly into the action during the battle. Added Infiltrator functionality: Allows units with this ability to deploy ahead of the main force at the start of a battle. Added Drop Pod Overrides: Allows faction specific Droppods or alternate methods of insertion. Added Twin Linked special rule: Weapons marked with this are now the same profile as normal versions, but fire 2 shots at a time. Added Rending Special rule: Weapons marked with the Rending Rule have a chance to ignore all armour(Melee Weapons: only select verbs attacks are rending)(Ranged Weapons: Only the marked verbs attacks are rending) Added Arcing Special rule: Necron Tesla Weapons have a chance to jump to up to 3 extra nearby targets Added Volkite Special rule: Volkite Weapons AP begins to falloff at over half range. Added Conversion Beamer Special rule: Conversion Beam Weapons do more damage to targets the further they are away (base damage + distance to target). Added Random Weapon Graphics: Allows weapons to choose from a list of graphics, giving more visual variety (Grot Blasta ,Choppas, Autopistol, LasPistol, LasGun, LongLas, Lucius LasGun). Added Quality Based Weapon Grapgics: Allows weapons to use different graphics dependant on quality(Imperial Power Sword) Added Move Through Cover special rule: Units with this rule do not take a movement penalty when moving though most terrain types (Pathfinding remains unchanged currently however). Added Ranged Hediff Verbs: allows hediffs to give ranged attacks. Added Hediff Shields: Allows hediffs to give shields. Added Compasite Apparel: Allows apparel to render secondry parts, such as pauldrons and backpacks. Added Extras Apparel: Special apparel for drawing extra wargear peices equipped by pawns. Swapped from using JecsTools lasers to RimLaser Lasers (Thanks AUTOMATIC!) Added Extra Functionality to RimLasers, including randomized and animated laser textures, and lightning beam effects. Added smoke trails to Flamer projectiles and Bolts. Added compatability patch between JecsTools OverSizedWeapons, ActivateableEffects ands Roolo's Dual Wield, these should now correctly display. Probobly a bunch of other crap i cant remember too.
LanguageData.AMO_FungusOptionsToolTip: Orkoid Fungus spawnrate options/nBase chance to spawn a Pawn when harvested
LanguageData.AMO_CocoonOptionsToolTip: Orkoid Cocoon spawnrate options/nBase chance to spawn a Pawn when harvested
LanguageData.AMO_SquigToolTip: Controls how often a Squig is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AMO_SnotToolTip: Controls how often a Snotling is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AMO_GrotToolTip: Controls how often a Grot is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AMO_OrkToolTip: Controls how often a Ork is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.OG_AMXO_NonOrkoidTamer: Only Orks and Grots can tame {0}'s
LanguageData.OGOrk_FungalHarvest_SuccessMessage: {0} found a newly emerged {1} while harvesting fungus
LanguageData.AMXBOrkzUpdate:
- Added update notice - Added Orkoid Fungi All Orkoid races are symbiotic with species of fungus. In fact, all of them grow from the same spores - depending on conditions the same spore may grow to a mighty Warboss or a harmless fungi. In this way, Orkoids are not just a race, but a whole ecosystem in itself. When Orks invade new worlds, this ecosystem grows. It is widely known that once a world is invaded by Orks, it is never entirely free from them again. Ork spores grow in the wilderness, giving birth to a new forms of Orkoid life.
Different forms of Orkoid Fungus play essential roles in Ork society. Ork Settlements are surrounded by great patches of the fungi. Cultivated by Snotlings, they are a primal source of food in Ork society. - Added Orkoid Fungal Cocoon Incedent
LanguageData.OGKroot_Genetic_Absorb_Replace: {0} gained the {1} trait from {2}'s corpse, it replaced their {3} trait
LanguageData.AMXB_ForceRelationsDesc: Forces racial relations to match Lore more closely

LanguageData.AMXenoBiologiespdate: Adeptus Mechanicus: Xenobiologis Update - Added update notice. - Finaly figured out how to fix the multiple meat entries. - Added Humanlike Mechanicus Pawns (Tech-Priest and Skitarii are now humanlikes with armour). - Disabled Siege's for all non Humanlike races.
